Request - Class in com
The Request class represents a request made for a project.
Request(Project, RequestType) - Constructor for class com.Request
Creates a new request for the specified project and request type, with a pending status.
RequestController - Class in com
The RequestController class handles requests made by students and supervisors regarding FYP projects.
RequestController(StuToFYPReq) - Constructor for class com.RequestController
Constructs a RequestController object to handle a student's request to change the FYP project.
RequestController(StuToSupReq) - Constructor for class com.RequestController
Constructs a RequestController object to handle a student's request to change the project supervisor.
RequestController(SupToFYPReq) - Constructor for class com.RequestController
Constructs a RequestController object to handle a supervisor's request to transfer a student to a new FYP project.
requestStatus - Variable in enum class com.RequestStatus
A string representation of the request status.
RequestStatus - Enum Class in com
An enum class representing the status of a request.
requestType - Variable in enum class com.RequestType
The string representation of the request type.
RequestType - Enum Class in com
The RequestType enum represents the types of requests that can be made by students and supervisors regarding FYP projects.
RESERVED - Enum constant in enum class com.ProjectStatus
The project is reserved by a student but not yet allocated.
